title: Insights into size-segregated distribution of benzothiazoles in indoor aerosols from office environments

Understanding the impact of rubber-derived particles on indoor environmental quality is crucial for effective environmental management. Emissions from both roads and textiles are recognized contributors to pollution across diverse environments,...
